Young gladiators seek you out, begging for you to share your insights on the art of combat.

Alternative Reward: Glory Boon - Uncommon

Properties:

  • You gain a +1 item bonus to Insight checks. Level 14: +3 item bonus. Level 24: +5 item bonus.
  • Rather than drawing a Fortune Card at the start of an encounter, you can choose one tactics card from your Fortune Card deck and start the encounter with that card in your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

Power âœ¦ Daily ()

Trigger: You draw a Fortune Card from the attack or defense category.

Effect: You discard the card and draw cards until you get a tactics card, discarding all non-tactics cards.
